data.name: BUTCHER - Extended Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Heavy atmospheric soundtrack by dark independent music legend Maciej Niedzielski (Artrosis, Alienoil, Sui Generis Umbra).

Includes:
* Original game soundtrack
* Extended versions of tracks
* Bonus unused tracks + experimental tracks.

Tracklist:
01. Menu (1:30)
02. Intro (0:37)
03. Gate(1:04)
04. Ironworks Facility Theme (1:37)
05. Lava Action Theme (3:04)
06. Old Military Base Theme (1:19)
07. Jungle Outpost Theme (3:49)
08. Volcano Research Station Theme (2:23)
09. The Last City Theme (3:42)
10. Club Fort Theme (1:24)
11. Boss Theme (2:40)
12. Outro and Credits (2:44)
[Bonus material]
13. Menu Music Extended (9:39)
14. Overworld (1:42)
15. Ambient (1:55)
16. Alternative Boss Music (2:33)
17. Butcher (0:38)
18. Terminated (2:55)
19. Fuck the Police (0:45)
20. Gate 2 (1:24)
21. Gate and Intro (3:37)
22. Ironworks Variation I (1:14)
23. Ironworks Variation II (0:53)
24. World Browser (2:37)
25. Panzerfaust (1:37)
26. Cum on Metal (1:15)
27. Drilling into Brain Pus (3:12)
28. Heta Rae Remix (2:50)
